name: Tanishq Jewellery - Ujjain - Freeganj
address: 6, Bhoj Marg, Freeganj, Madhav Nagar, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text:
I recently visited the Tanishq Jewellery Showroom in Ujjain, and I must say, it was an exceptional experience. As soon as I stepped into the showroom, I was greeted by the warm and welcoming staff. The ambiance was elegant and sophisticated, perfectly reflecting the Tanishq brand.

The jewellery collection was stunning, with a wide range of designs to suit various tastes and preferences. From traditional to modern, the pieces were intricately crafted and showcased exceptional workmanship. I was particularly impressed by the 'Mia' collection, which featured beautiful, handcrafted pieces with a focus on comfort and wearability.

What truly stood out, however, was the exceptional customer service. The staff was knowledgeable, patient, and helpful, taking the time to understand my preferences and making recommendations accordingly. They also offered me a complimentary cleaning and maintenance service for my purchase, which was a lovely touch.

Overall, my experience at Tanishq Jewellery Showroom in Ujjain was outstanding. The combination of stunning jewellery, excellent customer service, and a welcoming ambiance makes it a must-visit destination for anyone looking for exquisite jewellery in Ujjain. I would highly recommend it to friends and family.

Rating: 5/5 stars

name: Jariwala Gems and Jewellery
address: Jariwala Market, 89/90, Lakherwadi, Kamri Marg, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456006, India

reviews.text:
Me and my family have been buying jewellery from Jariwala jewels from last 15+ years. One of the most reliable jewelers, we have never had any issue from their side. Owners are very friendly and always give very favourable suggestion to consumers.
I can't think of any other shop/jewellers with such integrity and customer service.

This shop used to be the one stop shop for our jewellery shopping a decade ago. Sadly we were badly fooled. Most of the jewelry bought from them is 18 carat which was said to be 22carat (916 as the owner said). Nothing bought was hallmarked, no certificate. After a decade when I got my jewellery scanned under an X ray scanner I got shock of my life. I learnt a lesson of my life and decided to put this review as I dont want others to get fooled. Beware people!!!
Bad god

reviews.text: I had an absolutely wonderful experience at this jewelry shop. The collection is stunning, with a perfect blend of traditional and modern designs. and it received so many compliments! The staff was extremely polite, knowledgeable, and helped me choose the right piece within my budget. What I appreciated the most was their transparency regarding quality and pricing, along with proper certification. The packaging was elegant, and the delivery was right on time. I will definitely return for future purchases and highly recommend this shop to anyone looking for high-quality, beautiful jewelry.

I had a great experience at DPK Jewellers. They have an excellent collection with flexible purchase policies, which truly encourage customers to shop more. A special mention to Jayshree, who was extremely helpful and knowledgeable. She patiently showed us a wide range of options and ensured all our requirements were fulfilled. Truly commendable service!

name: Krishna Palace Ujjain - Jewelry, Cosmetics, & Undergarments
address: Krishna Palace, Famous Aloo Bada Ka Corner, Metro Talkies Road, Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh 456001, India

reviews.text: I recently visited Krishna Palace in Ujjain to complete my wedding shopping, and it was the perfect choice. From beautiful handmade necklaces and elegant bangles to quality nail paints, handbags, undergarments, night suits, and more, I found everything I needed in one place. The variety and quality of products at Krishna Palace are outstanding, making it the ideal destination for bridal shopping in Ujjain. Highly recommend Krishna Palace for those seeking a diverse selection of wedding essentials and premium products. A wonderful shopping experience!

Purchased Gown, Undergarments, and Beauty Products

Krishna Palace is my go-to store for all my fashion and beauty needs. I recently purchased a gorgeous gown, undergarments, and some beauty products, and I’m extremely happy with the quality. The range of products they offer is amazing, and the prices are very reasonable. The staff is friendly and provides excellent customer service. Whether you’re looking for fashionable gowns, comfortable undergarments, or top-quality cosmetics, Krishna Palace has it all! Highly recommended for anyone in Ujjain looking for great products and an overall satisfying shopping experience.

Krishna Palace is my go-to for all things fashion and beauty! From undergarments and cosmetics to perfumes and jewelry, I found everything I needed in one place.
